JOB NARRATIVE  
 
Mechanical  Engineer (Plumbing  & Fire Fighting )  
1. To  Prepare the Shop drawing, Co -ordination drawings and As built  drawings submit to the  
consultant/Client for final approval.  
2. To Prepare the Material submittal and method Statement to the  consultant/Client for final 
approval.  
3. Technical  Supervision under the Assistance of the Construction Manager/Project Manager.  4. Quantity  Takes off of Plumbing and Firefighting services fo r the Project.  
5. To  the follow up of Site works and Materials up to completion of the Project.  
6. Participating  in Site meetings/Co -ordination/workshop meetings with Client/Consultant/Mep 
Contractor.  
7. Prepare  the daily site activity Planning report and daily distribution of Manpower as per work 
activity and submit to main contractor/Project manager requirements.  
8. Preparing  Materials requirements as per the consultant approval material / drawings.  
9. Implemented of all aspects of plumbing design includi ng domestic cold/hot water supply 
system, sanitary sewage/grease waste system, Storm water/Rainwater harvesting system and 
Firefighting system.  
10. Site supervision/site execution of Plumbing and Firefighting system as per the Project 
Specification / Contr actor’s documents and international/local specific standards.  
11. Co -ordinate with main contractor’s engineers and other site engineers like Electrical HVAC 
eng…  
12. Co -ordinate with all MEP activity works, Structural  & Architectural  and other related site  
works.  
13. Co -ordinate with Client, Consultant, Main Contractor, Suppliers and other subcontractors.  
14. Prepare and submit  the works inspection request, Material request, RFI, Closing of NCR 
and Closing of Snag list for the final project finishing Stage.  
12. To Prepare the weekly / Monthly work Planning/work progress report.  
13. Assist  to Estimation department for quantity Takes off of the Plumbing and Firefighting 
service/System.  
14. Assist and co -ordinate with Planning and Procurement department for the project 
completion work.  
15. To Prepare the Monthly invoice running bill.  
16. Testing  and Commissioning for Plumbing and Firefighting systems.  
 
Nature of mechanical building works  
Execution , Supervision  & Testing Commissioning of following works.  
      Drainage / Rain Harvesting System and Water Supply System  
      Condensate drain System  
      Domestic Pumps & Water Filtration System  
      Solar water Heater System  
      Fire Fighting System  
      Fire Fighting Pumps(Jacky, Electrical and Diesel.)                                        EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATION
